title: Building the Future
description:
Our very own Jeremy Boreing announces a 100 million dollar investment to launch DW Kids to create family content parents can trust. But most importantly, he then charts an inspiring path forward for The Daily Wire, its employees, its fans, and the country at large. His message?
Enough with the complaining. It’s time for conservatives to create, invent and build the world we want to see. 
How? By partnering with those who love America as much as we do.
Together, with your help, we can build the world we want to see. Become a Daily Wire member today for 45% off with code DWKIDS.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
